podcasts.title: This world is for the Takers
podcasts.description: Like everything else in life, one has to be aware that you have to seize the opportunity and when it actually present itself In this generation, most people are waiting to be handed over opportunity, they are waiting either for the connected or rich parent, uncle, relative to connect with an opportunity. As a world changer –one has to be willing to take the opportunities that present themselves. Most often they are not covered in glitz and glamour- they come in form of work! HARD WORK. So, go and be a world taker- You have all that you need inside of you to seek the opportunity and seize it.

podcasts.title: Positioning yourself for a promotion
podcasts.description: How do you position yourself for a promotion at the workplace? Do you desire and are taking deliberate actions towards positioning yourself for a promotion? Join me as we discuss how you can work towards positioning yourself for a promotion. Growth is for those who desire it and intentionally pursue it.
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/694TOFhU2SCuC4YTBaMmWR?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Understanding Personalities at the workplace
podcasts.description: Are you aware of your personality type? As a people Manager, do you know your teams/colleagues Personality Type? Do you know how to apply the diverse personalities within the team to promote team cohesiveness. How do you use the positive and negative personality traits within you team members to foster team work? Listen, Learn and Apply!
podcasts.iframe: <iframe style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/episode/5hMUIsJBRB9TkPpeSEnGHA?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="150" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>

podcasts.title: Work Life Balance - Managing Stress in the workplace
podcasts.description: Are you stressed at work? Do you know the factors leading to stress? Do you have work-life balance? How can you strive towards having a work –life balance? Join me as we dicsuss some of the stress triggers which you can begin to become aware of as well as how to better manage yourself. Because….. Everyone experiences stress to some degree. The way you respond to stress, however, makes a big difference to your overall well-being.
